title: The development permission for quarrying shall be granted for period of 1 year and may be revalidated every year for a maximum period of 3 years
clause_text: The development permission for quarrying shall be granted for period of 1 year and may be revalidated every year for a maximum period of 3 years. After this fresh permission for further quarrying will be necessary. In granting such fresh permission, the Authority shall have regard to the applicantâ€˜s performance in observing the approved excavation and restoration plans, and in carrying out the quarrying operations in accordance with these guidelines.
